generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a bicycle lane marking, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the curb and trees.
- building: Multi-story brick buildings line the left side of the road.
- fence: A dark metal fence runs along the right side of the road, next to the sidewalk.
- pole: A tall, dark pole is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic light: A traffic light is mounted on the pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the right side of the road and partially overhang the scene.
- terrain: Grass and some weeds are visible along the edge of the road on the left side.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings on the left side, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is standing on the road near the sidewalk on the right side, wearing a patterned shirt and dark pants.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and a few are visible driving in the distance.
